name: Ambipom
author: Kouki Saitou
flavor_text: To eat, it deftly shucks nuts with its two tails. It rarely uses its arms now.

attacks.name: Tail Influence
attacks.effect: Your opponent flips a coin until he or she gets heads. For each tails, remove an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon and put it on the bottom of your opponent’s deck.

attacks.name: Charity Tail
attacks.effect: Before Ambipom does damage, your opponent may discard 2 cards from his or her hand. If he or she does, this attack’s base damage is 10 instead of 80.
